item.title: The Lurking Horror
item.description: In the midst of this beastly summer we’ve just entered, nothing seems farther away than the lung-clenching air of winter. When things are this hot, and pools and popsicles fail to cool, there’s one foolproof way to get into the spirit of winter: The Lurking Horror. … you practically froze to death slogging over here from the dorm. Not to mention jumping at every shadow, what with all the recent disappearances.
